title: Tilnefningar fyrir Dance Awards 2001
text:
Tónlsitartímaritið Muzik birti nú á dögunum tilnefningar sínar fyrir Dance Awards 2001.
Þeir sem vilja taka þátt í valinu geta gert það annað hvort með valseðli í september hefti Muzik eða inn á vefsíðu BBC Radio 1. Verðlaunin verða afhent þann 11. október
****
http://www.bbc.co.uk/radio1/dance/
****
En hér koma tilnefningarnar.
BEST ALBUM (Voted by readers and sponsored by Virgin Retail)
Air: ‘10,000 Hz Legend’ (Virgin)
Basement Jaxx: ‘Rooty’ (XL)
Daft Punk: ‘Discovery’ (Virgin)
Felix Da Housecat: ‘Kittenz And Thee Glitz’ (City Rockers)
Outkast: ‘Stankonia’ (Arista)
Oxide & Neutrino: ‘Execute’ (East West)
BEST SINGLE (Voted by readers)
The Avalanches: ‘Since I Left You’ (XL)
Chocolate Puma: ‘I Wanna Be U’ (Cream)
Daft Punk: ‘One More Time’ (Virgin)
Missy Elliot: ‘Get Ur Freak On’ (East West)
Roger Sanchez: ‘Another Chance’ (Defected)
Rui Da Silva: ‘Touch Me’ (Kismet)
Silicone Soul: ‘Right On, Right On’ (Soma)
Sticky featuring Miss Dynamite: ‘Booo!’ (London)
BEST VIDEO (Voted by readers and sponsored by MTV Dance)
Basement Jaxx: ‘Romeo’ (XL)
Daft Punk: ‘One More Time’ (Virgin)
Fatboy Slim: ‘Weapon Of Choice’ (Skint)
Missy Elliot: ‘Get UR Freak On’ (Epic)
So Solid Crew: ‘21 Seconds’ (Relentless)
Wu Tang Clan: ‘Gravel Pit’ (Epic)
BEST CLUB/CLUB NIGHT (Voted by readers and sponsored by Rapture TV)
Code, Birmingham (Gods Kitchen/Babooshka/Session)
Colours, Scotland
Cream, Liverpool
Fabric, London (Fabric/Fabric Live)
Gatecrasher, Sheffield
Lush!, Portrush, NI
Turnmills, London (The Gallery/Headstart/London Calling/Trade)
Twice As Nice, London
BEST DJ (Voted by readers and sponsored by The News Of The World)
Carl Cox
Danny Tenaglia
Erick Morillo
Fatboy Slim
Fergie
Sasha
Steve Lawler
BEST RADIO I ESSENTIAL MIX (Readers and sponsored by Radio 1)
Craig Richards and Lee Burridge
Jan Driver
Lucien Foort
Paul Jackson
Sander Kleinenberg
Tom Middleton
BEST IBIZA TUNE (Voted by readers)
Armand Van Helden: ‘Why Can’t You Free Some Time For Me' (Armed)
The Chemical Brothers: ‘It began in Afrika’ (Virgin)
Guitarra G: ‘G Club’ (Defected)
Kings Of Tomorrow: ‘Finally’ (Defected)
Pete Heller presents Sputnik: ‘Stylus Trouble’ (Junior)
Raven Maize: ‘The Real Life’ (Ministry of Sound)
Vaiio: ‘Rapture’ (Ministry of Sound)
BEST IBIZA CLUB (Voted by readers)
Circo Loco at DC10
Cream at Amnesia
Judgement Sundays at Eden
Manumission at Privilege
Renaissance at Privilege
Subliminal & Underwater present Subliminal Sessions at Pacha
We Love Sundays at Space
BEST NEW ARTIST (Sponsored by AIM)
Goldfrapp
Gorillaz
Lemon Jelly
Oxide & Neutrino
So Solid Crew
Zero 7
BEST MAJOR LABEL (Sponsored by Music Week)
Arista
Columbia
East West
Polydor
Positiva
Virgin
BEST BEDROOM BEDLAM DJ (Sponsored by BPI)
James Zabiela
Jay Cunning
Paolo Mojo
Stephen Marsh
Will Saul
BEST PRODUCER
Ed Case
Miguel Migs
Tiesto
Timbaland
Tom Stephan
X-Press 2
BEST UNDERGROUND CLUB/CLUB NIGHT
The Bomb, Nottingham
The Boutique, Brighton
The End, London
Movement, London
Pressure, Glasgow
Shindig, Newcastle
Tribal Sessions, Manchester
BEST REMIX
De La Soul: ‘All Good’ MJ Cole Remix (Tommy Boy)
Depeche Mode: ‘I Feel Loved’ Danny Tenaglia Remix (Mute)
The Electronauts: ‘Bumper’ Plump DJs Remix (Finger Lickin)
Fatboy Slim: ‘Star 69’ Timo Maas Remix (Skint)
Kosheen: ‘Hide U’ Stephan K & John Creamer Remix (Moksha)
KC Flightt Versus Funky Junction: ‘Voices’ Pete Heller Remix (Hooj)
BEST EVENT
Creamfields
Gatecrasher Summer Sound System
Global Gathering
Homelands
Knebworth ‘01
The Big Chill
BEST BREAKTHROUGH DJ
Nick Sentience
Plump DJs
Stanton Warriors
Tayo
Yousef
BEST INDIE LABEL
Defected
EukaTech
Junior
Nukleuz
Relentless
V
BEST BAND
Air
The Avalanches
Basement Jaxx
Daft Punk
Faithless
Outkast
BEST LIVE ACT
Air
The Avalanches
Eminem
Mark B & Blade
Orbital
Slam
BEST RADIO SHOW
Alex P & Brandon Block (KISS)
Dreem Team (Radio 1)
Nuphonic, London Xpress (XFM)
Seb Fontaine (Radio 1)
Paul Oakenfold’s Urban Soundtracks (Galaxy)
Pete Tong (Radio 1)
BEST COMPILATION
The Chillout Session (Ministry of Sound)
Danny Tenaglia London 017 (Global Underground)
Dave Clarke: World Service (React)
Garage Fever (Twilight Leisure)
Stanton Warriors: Stanton Sessions (XL)
Telle (Wall of Sound)
BEST WEBSITE
Ammo City
Burnitblue
Groovetech
Ministry of Sound
nmedance.com
Radio1/dance
Worldpop/dance
CANER OF THE YEAR
Anne Savage
Annie Nightingale
Lawrence Malice
Lisa Lashes
Tyrone de Savrey & Chris Griffin of God's Kitchen
Endilega verið virk og takið þátt í þessu, því það er svo gaman!!

replies.text: hvar er thomsen í þessu öllu saman?

já  hefði nú spyrt að því sama….
en burt séð frá því er nokkuð flott að right on right on er þarna með tilnefningu fyrir besta lagið.

Right on, right on er náttúrulega brjálað og ég kýs það hér með!
Svo eru líka drulluflott remix þarna inni í þeim flokki. Pete heller mixið á voices er allveg snilld sem, Tenaglia mixið á I Feel Loved og Timo mixið á Star 69… og þessir menn eiga allveg uppá pallborðið hjá mér undanfarið… ekki það að ég sé að segja að hin remixin séu eitthvað léleg.
Annars hefði ég viljað sjá Zero 7 plötuna tilnefnda, var að hlusta á hana um daginn og hún er eip!
hvernig nenntiru að skrifa þetta allt   :)
Ég tók þetta annarsstaðar frá, ég skrifaði bara krúsídúllurnar þarna efst :D
